title: The $U_L(3) \times U_R(3)$ Extended Nambu--Jona-Lasinio Model in Differential Regularization
abstract: We employ the method of differential regularization to calculate explicitly the one-loop effective action of a bosonized $U_L(3)\times U_R(3)$ extended Nambu--Jona-Lasinio model consisting of scalar, pseudoscalar, vector and axial vector fields.
